TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IContextMenuCallback

summary.span: 将菜单项添加到快捷菜单。

span.span: Adds menu items to a shortcut menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用 IContextMenuCallback 接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 的编程的详细信息，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the IContextMenuCallback interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 AddItem(valuetype Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.CONTEXTMENUITEM& pItem) cil managed
Public Function AddItem (ByRef pItem As CONTEXTMENUITEM) As Integer

param.name: pItem
param.span: 指向具有要添加的项的 的指针。

span.span: A pointer to a with the item to add.

summary.span: 将单个项添加到快捷菜单。

span.span: Adds a single item to a shortcut menu.

Docs.returns: | 返回值 | 说明 | |--- |--- | | S\_OK | 成功添加了 pItem。| Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | pItem was added successfully. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | 发生意外错误。| | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_POINTER | pItem 为 NULL（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。| | E\_POINTER | pItem is null (Nothing in Visual Basic). | | E\_INVALIDARG | 一个或多个 成员包含一个或多个无效的值，或者包含导致已知错误的值。| | E\_INVALIDARG | One or more of the members contains one or more values that are not valid or the values cause a known error. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关编程的详细信息接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
